zh.name: 西王庄小区充电桩1
zh.review: 超方便的！而且应该是离教学楼最近的吧，就在东南门肯德基旁边，充电的时候还能去蹭个疯狂星期四，清华学生都爱来这

zh.name: 西王庄小区充电桩2
zh.review: 在西王庄小区入口处，靠近东南门，出来就是盒马，价格也很合适

zh.name: 华清嘉园21号楼充电桩
zh.review: 位置很好找,就在华清嘉园里面,充电的时候可以去附近的酒吧小酌一杯,环境很不错

zh.name: 华清嘉园9号楼充电桩
zh.review: 位置很好找,就在华清嘉园里面,充电的时候可以去附近的酒吧小酌一杯,环境很不错,但是有些时候小区大门不开，得找机会进去

zh.name: 北大44号楼充电站
zh.review: 推荐！位置特别好找就在家园食堂旁边，旁边有家泊星地咖啡，充电的时候可以去喝杯咖啡，基本都有空位

zh.name: 北大48号楼充电站
zh.review: 位置很好找在48号楼北面，充电桩数量充足

zh.name: 清华家属区充电桩
zh.location: 清华大学照澜职工食堂
zh.review: 劝退！没有家属充电卡根本充不了，有渠道的同学可以尝试去跟家属区的人搞一张充电卡

zh.name: 五道口优盛大厦充电桩
zh.review: 在巴黎贝甜再往东走可以看到停车棚，整体挺好的，就是得跟外卖小哥抢位置，然后有些混乱

zh.name: 王庄路小区充电站
zh.review: 各个小区里面都能找到，就是得熟悉一下自己小区的位置

en.name: Xiwangzhuang Community Charging Station 1
en.review: Super convenient! Probably the closest to teaching buildings, next to KFC at the southeast gate. You can grab KFC's crazy Thursday deals while charging. Tsinghua students love it here

en.name: Xiwangzhuang Community Charging Station 2
en.review: Located at the entrance of Xiwangzhuang Community, near the southeast gate. Hema Fresh is right outside, and the price is reasonable

en.name: Huaqing Jiayuan Building 21 Charging Station
en.review: Easy to find, inside Huaqing Jiayuan. You can enjoy a drink at nearby bars while charging, nice environment

en.name: Huaqing Jiayuan Building 9 Charging Station
en.review: Easy to find, inside Huaqing Jiayuan. You can enjoy a drink at nearby bars while charging. Nice environment, but sometimes the community gate is closed, need to find the right timing

en.name: PKU Building 44 Charging Station
en.review: Recommended! Very easy to find next to Jiayuan Cafeteria. There's a Parkingstar Coffee nearby where you can grab a coffee while charging. Usually has available spots

en.name: PKU Building 48 Charging Station
en.review: Easy to find on the north side of Building 48, plenty of charging spots available

en.name: Tsinghua Staff Quarter Charging Station
en.location: 清华大学照澜职工食堂
en.review: Not recommended! Can't charge without a staff charging card. Try to get a charging card from staff quarter residents if you have connections

en.name: Wudaokou Yousheng Building Charging Station
en.review: The parking shed is east of Paris Baguette. Overall good, but you need to compete with delivery riders for spots, can be a bit chaotic

en.name: Wangzhuang Road Community Charging Station
en.review: Can be found in various communities, just need to familiarize yourself with your community's location
